author: jochen
msg: The Java parser does now support wildcards in import statements.

author: danielf
msg: Remove swallowing of IOExceptions from the ResourceReader as it makes debuging of e.g. block protocol usage very hard. It seem like the situation is handled in the AbstractPipelineProcessor and the RequestProcessor anyway. See http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=xml-cocoon-dev&m=116250218603497&w=2 for a discussion.

author: oheger
msg: Changed the creation of file-based configurations in ConfigurationFactory so that the load() method is called only after all specified properties have been initialized; fix for CONFIGURATION-229
